channel.title: Talking npcs! need help!
channel.description:
Ok how do i make NPCS like tyras guards or barrows Say if owner is offline or online??
please help

item.title: Talking npcs! need help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (npcs.npcType == 944) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Admin")){ npcs.textUpdate = "Owner Admin is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs.textUpdate = "Owner Admin is OFFLINE"; } } }

thats better…

Read full topic

item.title: Talking npcs! need help!
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

Code:
moo
should look like:

Code:
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo”;
}

right after the last } press enter and copy and paste this:

Code:
if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Admin”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner Admin is ONLINE”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner Admin is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}[br][size=1]Posted at: September 16, 2006, 03:18:29 PM[/size][hr] anwenvfnrepnmwsvnjwef?
